review:
Dr. Srichandran saved my mom and dad* ** ** *** **** ************* He explained their condition and answered all our doubts / questions in a way we understood. Such a humble and simple person. It was a pleasure experience with him treating my parents. We are indebted for life to him. He has a great team too (at MGM hospital)  Dr. Vishnu and Dr.Vivekan, they are amazing too. All put together they rock !
Regards,
Smitha
